parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The deterioration of the headlight lens can reduce visibility while driving at night, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: reducing the headlight beam and causing poor visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Insufficient headlight throw can reduce visibility while driving at night, especially at higher speeds, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: making it difficult to see the road ahead

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The obstruction of the rear window can reduce visibility while driving, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear window is obstructed by a hump on the rear deck where the stereo speakers are located
making it difficult to see behind the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the front suspension can cause uneven tire wear, reduced vehicle stability, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Worn-out tires on the inside corner
clunking noise in the front end

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the air suspension can cause a rough ride, reduced vehicle stability, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Intermittent failure of the air suspension

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the transmission can cause erratic shifting, slipping, and loss of power, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: slipping of transmission when power is applied

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the door and window systems can cause inconvenience, reduced vehicle safety, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Driver-side front door window moves out of channel and jams
failure of the power window motor
and failure of the door to lock automatically.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the manufacturer to honor warranties and provide adequate service can cause financial loss and inconvenience to consumers.
symptoms: refusal to repair or make good on defects

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling fan can cause a fire, which can lead to property damage, injury, or even fatalities.
symptoms: smoke or flames are visible under the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent no-start issue and transmission problems can cause inconvenience, delay, and potentially lead to accidents or strand the driver.
symptoms: the transmission fluid is burnt or discolored.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine issues and noxious gases can cause health problems, discomfort, and potentially lead to accidents.
The head gasket failure can cause engine damage, overheating, and potentially lead to accidents or strand the driver.
The motor mount failure can cause vibration, noise, and potentially lead to engine damage or accidents.
A defective rear-view mirror can cause distorted or obstructed views, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially when reversing or changing lanes.
symptoms: and inability to adjust the mirror to deflect light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive glare and reflection issues can cause visual problems, including inability to see approaching cars, read instrument panels, or see signs, leading to increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Excessive glare from windshield and side windows
inability to see the road or dash during the day and night
and necessary to pull over to the side of the road to avoid accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An inefficient defogger system can reduce visibility, especially during inclement weather, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: and only small circular areas being cleared for vision.
